item.title: Ant task to compress HTML files
item.description: I will show you how to compress your HTML files using the Java library HtmlCompressor. So let’s say your html code looks something like this: <!doctype html> <html> <head> <title>htmlcompressor</title> </head> <body> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed gravida suscipit lectus. <!-- comment --> </body> </html> After we compress it, it’ll look like this: <!doctype html> <html> <head> <title>htmlcompressor</title> </head> <body> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
